title: runes and rune pages
body: is it worth investing ip in runes right now??? i really wanna play ekko and i would like to play him on an optimal level..i need some runes in order to do this. I understand that they will rework the runes.. but, i would like to purchase a few runes for this champ..should i do it??

replies.body: There's no reason to keep yourself at a disadvantage!  Our dev will be coming up with ways to take care of players who already received runes before the reforge.  Bookmark our [News](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) page for updates, and hang tight.
